definitions: a person claiming to possess special enlightenment or knowledge of something

examples.text: illuminists who had been enlightened by some of the teachings of the secret club

shortDefinitions: person claiming to possess special enlightenment

definitions: a member of a sect of 16th-century Spanish heretics who claimed special religious enlightenment

examples.text: Illuminists who conversed with the dead
an Illuminist theory of divine revelation

shortDefinitions: member of sect of 16th-century Spanish heretics

definitions: a member of a Bavarian secret society founded in 1776, organized like the Freemasons

examples.text: Bavarian Illuminists conspiring against the Jesuits
